title: Did the Census Bureau play a role in the arrest of Japanese Americans during World War II?
subtitle: Objections to citizenship questions in the 2020 census forms stem from concerns about the possibility of sharing data with other agencies, as mentioned in the Second World War.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Information shared with other agencies by the U.S. Census Bureau helped the government target the Japanese Americans for transport and imprisonment during World War II.
